metadata.title: CVE-2019-6978 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) 2.2.5 has a double free in thegdImage*Ptr() functions in gd_gif_out.c, gd_jpeg.c, and gd_wbmp.c. NOTE:PHP is unaffected.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.11
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.11').
